content: Hi, I have a trouble in running roc program in wsl platform, which give me a errorÂ Error: Os { code: 1, kind: PermissionDenied, message: "Operation not permitted" }, I have followed the instructions in install tab, can someone give me an advise?
Hi @ZipFast I think you may be running wsl version 1, can you check with wsl --version in the terminal?
If you're on wsl version 1, I think upgrading to 2 will fix your issue
Yes, I'm running wsl 1, really appreciate your help, thank you!
ZipFast has marked this topic as resolved.
